{"id":493953967,"lang":"cpp","time":"2Â months, 2Â weeks","timestamp":1621168506,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/493953967/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"71.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode* n1 = l1;\n        ListNode* n2 = l2;\n\n        \n        ListNode* ans=new ListNode((n1->val + n2->val)%10);\n        ListNode* curr=ans;\n        int carry = ((n1->val + n2->val) / 10);\n            \n        n1 = n1->next;\n        n2 = n2->next;\n        \n        while(n1 != NULL || n2!= NULL)\n        {\n            \n            int sum = carry;\n            if(n1!=NULL)\n                sum+=n1->val;\n            if(n2!=NULL)\n                sum+=n2->val;\n            carry = sum/10;\n            sum = sum%10;\n\n            curr->next = new ListNode(sum);\n            curr = curr->next;\n         \n            if(n1!=NULL)\n                n1 = n1->next;\n            if(n2!=NULL)\n                n2 = n2->next;\n        }\n        \n        if(carry>0)\n        {\n            curr->next = new ListNode(carry);\n            curr = curr->next;\n        }\n        \n        \n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
